text: Francesco Luoni (born 9 April 1988 in Varese) is an Italian professional football player who currently plays for U.S.D. 1913 Seregno Calcio in Serie D. ==Career== ===Seregno=== Luoni joined Seregno ahead of the 2019/20 season.Serie D – Seregno, altro colpo: ecco Luoni, tuttomercato24.com, 18 July 2019 ==References== ==External links== *Francesco Luoni at Tuttocalciatori Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie B players Category:Serie D players Category:Varese Calcio players Category:U.C. title: Francesco Luoni
